TopicTitle: (Badly Built) Salamis Class Cruiser + Cube (not BALL)

Articles.Content:
This is my first post here,

This stuff referred to EFSF Salamis Class Space Light Cruiser,

but it is very badly-built, just for fun

Since Balls are difficult to build in KSP, I put Cubes instead...

Hatch doors can be closed and they have arms, too !
Looks significantly better than my attempt at White Base. Very nice work.
